sentences.sentence: Some of us don't mind that our hero, playboy Tom (Patrick Dempsey), is one of New York's most notorious womanizers;
sentences.translation: 我们中的一些人对于我们的主人公——汤姆（帕特里克·德姆西）身为纽约市最为声名狼藉的花花公子毫不在意。

sentences.sentence: There's a huge contingent of Russian men that are alcoholics and womanizers and several of the ladies have gone through that and they just don't want that kind of man for their husband.
sentences.translation: 大批符合条件的俄罗斯男子是酗酒和玩弄女性的人，有些女士有过这样的经历，因此她们不想要那种男子做她们的丈夫。
